tool_description: Performs pre-calibration inspection of length measuring instruments to assess physical condition and basic functionality.

instrument_id.description: Unique identifier for the instrument being inspected

instrument_type.description: Type of measuring instrument (micrometer, caliper, gauge, CMM, laser_interferometer, optical_comparator)

error_messages: Instrument not found: The specified instrument_id is not recognized in the system.
Invalid instrument type: Use one of [micrometer, caliper, gauge, CMM, laser_interferometer, optical_comparator].
Physical damage detected: Instrument shows signs of damage that may affect measurement accuracy.
Mechanical malfunction: Instrument fails basic functionality tests and requires repair.
usage: Provide instrument_id and instrument_type to perform comprehensive pre-calibration inspection including physical condition and basic operational tests.

mechanical_function.description: Results of basic mechanical function tests

recommended_actions.description: List of recommended actions before calibration
